StuffTheSpire:PlasmaPunch.NAME: Plasma Punch
StuffTheSpire:PlasmaPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage !StuffTheSpire:Diminishing! times. Draw 1 card. NL stuffthespire:Decreasing 1.

StuffTheSpire:PlasmaPulse.NAME: Plasma Pulse
StuffTheSpire:PlasmaPulse.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block !StuffTheSpire:Diminishing! times. Draw 1 card. NL stuffthespire:Decreasing 1.

StuffTheSpire:FreeRealEstate.NAME: Free Real Estate
StuffTheSpire:FreeRealEstate.DESCRIPTION: stuffthespire:Unique. NL Gain !StuffTheSpire:Diminishing! Gold. Draw 1 card. NL stuffthespire:Decreasing 1.

StuffTheSpire:BloodClot.NAME: Blood Clot
StuffTheSpire:BloodClot.DESCRIPTION: Gain !StuffTheSpire:Diminishing! temporary max. Hp when you loose health from a card next time. NL stuffthespire:Decreasing 1.

StuffTheSpire:TitanForm.NAME: Titan Form
StuffTheSpire:TitanForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! stuffthespire:Dark_Fade. At the end of each turn loose 1 Strength.

StuffTheSpire:ReptileScales.NAME: ReptileScales
StuffTheSpire:ReptileScales.DESCRIPTION: Gain !StuffTheSpire:Diminishing! Plated Armor. NL Gain !B! Block. NL stuffthespire:Decreasing 1.

StuffTheSpire:Shiver.NAME: Shiver
StuffTheSpire:Shiver.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength. NL Discard a card. NL Add !M! Shiv to your hand. NL Apply 1 Weak to yourself and all enemies.
StuffTheSpire:Shiver.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength. NL Discard a card. NL Add !M! Shivs to your hand. NL Apply 1 Weak to yourself and all enemies.

StuffTheSpire:LaunchingStrike.NAME: Launching Strike
StuffTheSpire:LaunchingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Apply stuffthespire:Flight. NL When the target loses stuffthespire:Flight, deal !D! Damage again.

StuffTheSpire:Synthwave.NAME: Synthwave
StuffTheSpire:Synthwave.DESCRIPTION: Lightning triggers it's passive an additional time.

StuffTheSpire:ForEach.NAME: foreach(){}
StuffTheSpire:ForEach.DESCRIPTION: Trigger the passive ability of all of your orbs

StuffTheSpire:Pyroclast.NAME: Pyroclast
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: once. NL Add a Burn into your hand. NL stuffthespire:Decreasing 1.
!StuffTheSpire:Diminishing! times. NL Add a Burn into your hand. NL stuffthespire:Decreasing 1.

StuffTheSpire:LoadUp.NAME: Overload
StuffTheSpire:LoadUp.DESCRIPTION: Loose 1 Focus. NL Channel !M! Lightning. Next turn add a copy of stuffthespire:Discharge to your hand.

StuffTheSpire:Discharge.NAME: Discharge
StuffTheSpire:Discharge.DESCRIPTION: Evoke all of your orbs twice. NL Gain !M! Focus. NL Exhaust.

StuffTheSpire:Slingshot.NAME: Slingshot
StuffTheSpire:Slingshot.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. Deal !D! Damage. Apply !M! Vulnerable.

StuffTheSpire:RockToss.NAME: Rock Toss
StuffTheSpire:RockToss.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Draw 1 card. NL If this card is exhausted add a copy of this card to your hand next turn. It costs 0 for the rest of combat.
StuffTheSpire:RockToss.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Draw 1 card. NL If this card is exhausted add !M! copies of this card to your hand next turn. They cost 0 for the rest of combat.

StuffTheSpire:Injection.NAME: Injection
StuffTheSpire:Injection.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If the target isn't poisoned, apply !M! Poison. NL Exhaust.

StuffTheSpire:FlameBurst.NAME: Flame Burst
StuffTheSpire:FlameBurst.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !M! Damage to all enemies when this card exhausts.

StuffTheSpire:Incineration.NAME: Incineration
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Add !StuffTheSpire:Diminishing! stuffthespire:Flame_Burst into you hand. NL stuffthespire:Decreasing 1.
Add !StuffTheSpire:Diminishing! stuffthespire:Flame_Bursts into you hand. NL stuffthespire:Decreasing 1.

StuffTheSpire:BumpUp.NAME: Bump Up
StuffTheSpire:BumpUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Increase the Damage of all of your 2 cost cards by !M! %.

StuffTheSpire:RagingBull.NAME: Raging Bull
StuffTheSpire:RagingBull.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Gain 2 Dexterity. After you play !M! more cards loose 2 Dexterity.

StuffTheSpire:SnapShoot.NAME: Snap Shoot
StuffTheSpire:SnapShoot.DESCRIPTION: If you have at least 3 orbs channeled, permanently add a stuffthespire:Snapshot that channels your 3 front most orbs to your deck. NL Fleeting.
StuffTheSpire:SnapShoot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you have at least 3 orbs channeled, permanently add an upgraded stuffthespire:Snapshot that channels your 3 front most orbs to your deck. NL Fleeting.

StuffTheSpire:Incursion.NAME: Incursion
StuffTheSpire:Incursion.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 stuffthespire:Dark_Fade. When you loose HP, loose twice as much for !M! turns. NL Exhaust.
StuffTheSpire:Incursion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 stuffthespire:Dark_Fade. When you loose HP, loose twice as much for !M! turn. NL Exhaust.

StuffTheSpire:FinalStruggle.NAME: Final Struggle
StuffTheSpire:FinalStruggle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and loose !M! Hp until the target has died. Heal all Hp lost from this card at the end of combat.

StuffTheSpire:Coldhearted.NAME: Cold Hearted
StuffTheSpire:Coldhearted.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Frost. Gain !M! temporary max. HP.

StuffTheSpire:EventHorizon.NAME: Event Horizon
StuffTheSpire:EventHorizon.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played when you have at least 3 Dark channelled. NL Gain !M! stuffthespire:Dark_Fade. NL Exhaust.

StuffTheSpire:DoubleShiv.NAME: Double Shiv
StuffTheSpire:DoubleShiv.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Shivs into your hand. NL Exhaust.
StuffTheSpire:DoubleShiv.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! upgraded Shivs into your hand. NL Exhaust.

StuffTheSpire:Resist.NAME: Resist
StuffTheSpire:Resist.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you exhaust a status, gain !M! temporary max. HP.
StuffTheSpire:Resist.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you exhaust a status, gain !M! temporary max. HP. NL Add 2 stuffthespire:Flame_Bursts into your hand.

StuffTheSpire:NuclearReactor.NAME: Nuclear Reactor
StuffTheSpire:NuclearReactor.DESCRIPTION: Costs [E] less for every Frost you evoked this turn. NL Channel 2 Plasma. NL Apply !M! Poison to all enemies.

StuffTheSpire:GlassShard.NAME: Glass Shard
StuffTheSpire:GlassShard.DESCRIPTION: stuffthespire:Fragile. NL Deal !D! Damage. NL Apply !M! Frail to yourself.

StuffTheSpire:Incantation.NAME: Incantation
StuffTheSpire:Incantation.DESCRIPTION: stuffthespire:Fragile. NL When drawn gain !M! Strength. NL Ethereal.
StuffTheSpire:Incantation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When drawn gain !M! Strength. NL Ethereal.

StuffTheSpire:ChainStrike.NAME: Chain Strike
StuffTheSpire:ChainStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL stuffthespire:Chain !M! random stuffthespire:linked card in your hand. NL stuffthespire:Archetype: Chain.
StuffTheSpire:ChainStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL stuffthespire:Chain !M! random stuffthespire:linked cards in your hand. NL stuffthespire:Archetype: Chain.

StuffTheSpire:Razor.NAME: Razor Storm
StuffTheSpire:Razor.DESCRIPTION: stuffthespire:Linked. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL stuffthespire:Chain 1 random stuffthespire:linked card in your draw pile.

StuffTheSpire:Flurry.NAME: Flurry
StuffTheSpire:Flurry.DESCRIPTION: stuffthespire:Chain and exhaust all stuffthespire:linked cards in hand, draw- and discard pile. NL Exhaust.

StuffTheSpire:Surge.NAME: Surge
StuffTheSpire:Surge.DESCRIPTION: stuffthespire:Linked. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
StuffTheSpire:Surge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: stuffthespire:Linked. NL Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

StuffTheSpire:Flow.NAME: Flow
StuffTheSpire:Flow.DESCRIPTION: stuffthespire:Linked. NL heal 2 HP. NL stuffthespire:Chain 1 random stuffthespire:linked card in your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

StuffTheSpire:AbyssLink.NAME: Abyss Link
StuffTheSpire:AbyssLink.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn stuffthespire:chain !M! random stuffthespire:linked card from your discard pile.

StuffTheSpire:ShieldGenerator.NAME: Shield Generator
StuffTheSpire:ShieldGenerator.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Can be upgraded any number of times. NL Startup: Gain !M! temporary max. HP

StuffTheSpire:Fury.NAME: Fury
StuffTheSpire:Fury.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard all non-Attack cards.
StuffTheSpire:Fury.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard all non-Attack cards. NL Draw !M! cards.

StuffTheSpire:BrimstoneBlast.NAME: Brimstone Blast
StuffTheSpire:BrimstoneBlast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! poison to all enemies. NL Add a Burn to your hand. NL Exhaust.
